title: The Woj & Lowe Trade Deadline Show
description:
ESPN's Zach Lowe joins The Woj Pod as part of The Woj & Lowe Show to discuss the arms race between the LA teams (2:59), a sleeper team for Andre Igoudala (13:42), trades they want to see happen (20:40), and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
